EmailTemplate.name: Case/Dept. Owner assignment
EmailTemplate.subject: Case assignment EU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi “PSR name”,
you are the Case Owner for this case and you will lead it with the Partner/Customer until the closure of the case.
Department Owner for this case is “Logistic” and they will provide you with temporary solution (P5-follow up) and final solution (P30-Case closure).
Case Owner tasks: communicate the Partner/Customer their complaint status and update SF with P5/P30 actions (communication with the Partner has to be uploaded on SF) and expedite case with Dept. Owner (weekly basis follow up requesting them a solution as soon as possible, within 30 days).
Dept. Owner tasks: provide Case Owner with the solution (P5 temporary solution & P30 final solution), implement and verify the solution.
Many thanks for your support,
Regards
